author: jacopoc
msg: Some cleanups and changes to logging configuration:
* some misc formatting and changes to comments
* removed the old and unused configuration for minerva
* added a new file appender for Tomcat where all Tomcat internal logging is now redirected
* changed internal logging for FOP from info to warn to be consistent with the settings of other external components (Tomcat, Geronimo Transaction Manager, Freemarker)
